messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Oh, you want to have a battle?I was meaning to enter a Contest,
but beating you won’t take long...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
You and your Pokémon have so much
energy.I think you would do well in
Contests, too.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Oh, didn’t we meet before?I was meaning to enter a Contest,
but let’s have a quick battle first.
